content.name: Stations Trade Config Exchanger
content.author: Chem O`Dun
content.description:
Stations Trade Config Exchanger allows you to exchange the trade configuration from one station to another. It is useful when you want to have the same trade configuration for several stations.
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Transfer trade configuration between stations. [*] Can work with production and trading stations. [*] Allows selecting wares by groups: Resources, Intermediates, Products, Trade Wares. [*] Allows apply the entire ware configuration or only selectable trade ware aspects: Storage allocation, Buy order, Sell order. [*] Filters Station Two list to show only stations compatible with the Station One trade configuration. [/list] [h2][b]Limitations[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Can't work with stations contained the ships factory modules, i.e. with Shipyards and Wharfs. [*] Identifies trading stations as stations with cargo bays and without production modules. I.e. if your defence platform has cargo modules - it's will be identified as trading station. [/list] [h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b] 7.60 or newer (tested on 7.60 and 8.00). [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b] by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url] to be installed and enabled. Version [b]1.93[/b] and upper is required. [list] [*] It is available via Steam - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Or via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Caution[/b][/h2]
[b]Please, be aware that is first public release version of the Stations Trade Config Exchanger mod. Although it was tested in several scenarios, there may be some unforeseen issues or bugs.[/b]
[h2][b]Installation[/b][/h2]
You can download the latest version via Steam client - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3611019773]Stations Trade Config Exchanger[/url] Or you can do it via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1891]Stations Trade Config Exchanger[/url]
[h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
[h2]How to call the Trade Config Exchanger UI[/h2]
You can open the Trade Config Exchanger UI from the Stations Context Menu.
To do this, simply select a station on a [b]Map[/b] or from [b]Property Owned[/b] list, then right-click on it, and select [b]Trade Config Exchanger[/b] from the context menu.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/select_from_context_menu.png[/img]
[h2]Trade Config Exchanger UI[/h2]
The Trade Config Exchanger UI allows you to select the Station One and Station Two, and configure how the trade configuration will be exchanged between them.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/initial_screen_for_production_station.png[/img]
At the beginning only the Station One is selected, based on your previous selection. After selecting it, the Station Two selection will be enabled.
[h2]Station Two selection[/h2]
Only compatible stations will be shown in the Station Two list. It is determined based on the production configurations of the stations. It is made based on Intermediates and Products wares.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/station_two_selection_for_production_station.png[/img]
[h2]Station Two selection for trading stations[/h2]
When you open the Trade Config Exchanger UI from a trading station, the Station One will be preselected as the trading station, and the Station Two list will be filtered to show only compatible stations.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/station_two_selection_for_trade_station.png[/img]
[h2]Selecting what to exchange (clone)[/h2]
After selecting both stations, you can choose what to exchange (clone) between them.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/screen_after_both_stations_selected.png[/img]
You can choose to exchange (clone) the items with the different level of detail: [list] [*] Per Ware Group: Resources, Intermediates, Products, Trade Wares. [/list] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/selected_resources_group_of_wares.png[/img] [list] [*] Per single ware. [/list] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/selected_single_whole_ware.png[/img] [list] [*] Per ware trade configuration aspect: Storage Allocation, Buy Order, Sell Order. [/list] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/selected_different_aspects_in_different_wares.png[/img]
[h2]Executing the exchange (clone)[/h2]
After selecting what to exchange (clone), you should select a confirmation checkbox, [b]Confirm before proceeding with cloning[/b], and then click appropriate button: [list] [*] [b]Clone >[/b] to clone the trade configuration from the Station One to the Station Two. [*] [b]< Clone[/b] to clone the trade configuration from the Station Two to the Station One. [/list] [h3][b]Cloning example from Station One to Two Station[/b][/h3]
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/from_one_to_two_before_cloning.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/from_one_to_two_after_cloning.png[/img]
[h3][b]Cloning example from Station Two to One Station[/b][/h3]
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/from_two_to_one_before_cloning.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/from_two_to_one_after_cloning.png[/img]
[h3][b]Trade Stations "Full" Cloning Examples[/b][/h3]
[h3][u]Cloning from configured to "empty" trade station[/u][/h3]
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/empty_station_before.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/full_to_empty_before_page_one.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/full_to_empty_before_page_two.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/full_to_empty_after_page_two.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/empty_station_after.png[/img]
[h3][u]Cloning from "empty" to configured trade station[/u][/h3]
In this example will be cloned all "empty" wares except first and last wares that will be left unchanged.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/empty_to_full_before_page_one.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/empty_to_full_before_page_two.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/empty_to_full_after.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StationsTradeConfigExchanger/refs/heads/main/docs/images/full_station_after.png[/img]
[h2][b]Video[/b][/h2]
Video demonstration of the Stations Trade Config Exchanger. Version 1.00 [previewyoutube=cWfU4Az8yAo;full][/previewyoutube]
P.S. Credits and Acknowledgements in README.md

text.description: Stations Trade Config Exchanger allows you to exchange the trade configuration from one station to another. It is useful when you want to have the same trade configuration for several stations.

Stations Trade Config Exchanger vous permet d'échanger la configuration commerciale d'une station vers une autre. C'est utile lorsque vous souhaitez appliquer la même configuration commerciale à plusieurs stations.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger te permite transferir la configuración comercial de una estación a otra. Resulta útil cuando quieres tener la misma configuración comercial en varias estaciones.

Stations Trade Config Exchanger consente di trasferire la configurazione commerciale da una stazione a un'altra. È utile quando desideri utilizzare la stessa configurazione commerciale su più stazioni.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger vám umožní přenést obchodní konfiguraci z jedné stanice na druhou. Je užitečný, když chcete používat stejnou obchodní konfiguraci na několika stanicích.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger allows you to exchange the trade configuration from one station to another. It is useful when you want to have the same trade configuration for several stations.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger pozwala przenieść konfigurację handlową z jednej stacji na inną. Jest przydatny, gdy chcesz mieć tę samą konfigurację handlową na kilku stacjach.

Stations Trade Config Exchanger ermöglicht es dir, die Handelseinstellungen von einer Station auf eine andere zu übertragen. Das ist hilfreich, wenn du auf mehreren Stationen dieselbe Handelseinstellung verwenden möchtest.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger permite transferir a configuração comercial de uma estação para outra. É útil quando você deseja usar a mesma configuração comercial em várias estações.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger を使えば、あるステーションの取引設定を別のステーションにコピーできます。複数のステーションで同じ取引設定を使いたいときに便利です。
Stations Trade Config Exchanger 를 사용하면 한 스테이션의 거래 설정을 다른 스테이션으로 이전할 수 있습니다. 여러 스테이션에서 동일한 거래 설정을 사용하고 싶을 때 유용합니다.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger 可让你将一座空间站的贸易配置传输到另一座空间站。当你希望多座空间站使用相同的贸易配置时，它非常实用。
Stations Trade Config Exchanger আপনাকে এক স্টেশনের বাণিজ্য কনফিগারেশন আরেক স্টেশনে স্থানান্তর করতে দেয়। একাধিক স্টেশনে একই বাণিজ্য কনফিগারেশন রাখতে চাইলে এটি খুবই উপকারী।

Stations Trade Config Exchanger, bir istasyonun ticaret yapılandırmasını başka bir istasyona aktarmanızı sağlar. Birden fazla istasyonda aynı ticaret yapılandırmasını kullanmak istediğinizde faydalıdır.
Stations Trade Config Exchanger дозволяє передавати торгові налаштування з однієї станції на іншу. Це корисно, коли ви хочете мати однакові торгові налаштування для кількох станцій.
